How it tastes

Description:
White tea at its finest, Bai Hao Yin Zhen is revered as one of the top teas in China. Our silver needle white tea uses only the first leaves and silvery, unopened buds of the tea plant, plucked by hand during the April harvest. You’ll love this tea’s pure, delicate taste and sweet complexity, not to mention the underlying grassy notes no tea lover can resist.
What makes it great

White tea is the least processed tea, meaning all the skin-loving antioxidants found in the leaf aren't broken down.
Comes from a small family-owned garden that has been making tea for over 5 generations.
To make this tea, the buds are plucked by hand in early April, when the mornings are still cold but it doesn’t rain every day.
Ingredients: High-grown white tea from the mountains of Fujian Province, China.
Name: Bai Hao Yin Zhen

Ever heard of a dirty chai? A great alternative to coffee, it’s usually a single or double shot of espresso and spiced black tea. Of course, we had to take it a step further – with chocolate. Mocha Chai is an Elephant Approved® tea with a unique chocolate-forward flavour and a spicy chai twist. Welcome to coco chai love.
What makes it great

 Premium black tea base certified by Elephant Approved® – a non-profit organization working to reduce Human-Elephant Conflict in tea-producing regions worldwide.
 Who says you have to choose between tea & coffee? This blend delivers the best of both worlds.
 To be honest, it’s the Ghirardelli chocolate that does it for us.
Ingredients:
100% Elephant Approved black tea, Dark chocolate chips (sugar, chocolate liquor, cocoa butter, soy lecithin, vanilla bean), Roasted yerba mate, Cacao, Chocolate  (sugar, Dutch cocoa, unsweetened chocolate, soy lecithin, vanilla), Dark coffee bean, Cinnamon, Clove, Ginger, Natural (cinnamon, clove, milk chocolate) flavouring.

view more
view less
Name: Mocha Chai

Flavor:
How it tastes
Blood orange on the nose with notes of black tea & hibiscus.
Description:
It’s no secret – we love putting our own spin on the classic Earl Grey. In fact, our first ever EG twist was Cream of Earl Grey, and it’s now one of our bestselling blends. This time, we’re bringing you a lively citrus version. Experience freshly pressed blood orange on the nose with notes of black tea and hibiscus, which help lend body to the cup. The bergamot lingers long after each sip, solidifying this tea as a splendidly refined blend.
What makes it great

 A bright & complex take on the classic Earl Grey that’s right on-trend.
 Freshly pressed blood orange dominates the flavor.
 Black tea & hibiscus lend body and astringency to liven the cup.
Ingredients: Organic black tea, Organic orange peel, Organic rosehip, Organic hibiscus, Organic calendula petal, Natural (bergamot, orange, tangerine) flavouring.
Name: Blood Orange Earl Grey Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
 Traditional ""Mexican hot chocolate"" taste: malty chocolate, with notes of cinnamon, vanilla and a creamy hint of coconut in the background
Description:
A devilishly delicious treat. Give yourself over to this sweet and spicy organic black tea blend with rich and comforting notes of dark chocolate, vanilla, creamy coconut and a warming hint of cinnamon. Hotter than an inferno and smoother than silk, this energizing brew is a real piece of work – especially when you make it as a frothy tea latte. 
What makes it great

 Made with a rich and energizing base of organic black tea. 
 Try this cinnamon-chocolate tea as a latte with a shot of Baileys. 
 The perfect afternoon indulgence.
Ingredients: Organic black tea, Organic dark chocolate (cocoa beans, sugar, cocoa butter, ground vanilla bean), Organic cinnamon, Organic coconut flakes, Natural vanilla flavouring.
Name: Stormy Night Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
Rich with warming cinnamon and sweet caramel flavours, plus a hint of creaminess from the marshmallows
Description:
Give thanks with ultimate fall indulgence. Made with a premium black tea base certified by Elephant Approved® – a non-profit organization that aims to help reduce Human Elephant Conflict in tea producing regions around the world – this spiced sweet potato tea is a feel-good way to treat yourself while doing some good. It’s got all the warmth of spices like cinnamon and nutmeg, plus a sweet and creamy marshmallow finish – perfect for lattes.
For more information about Elephant Approved®, visit https://www.elephantapproved.net/
What makes it great

 Made with a premium black tea base that’s certified by Elephant Approved® – a non-profit organization that aims to help reduce Human Elephant Conflict in tea producing regions around the world.
 This spiced black tea is the perfect fall treat, especially when you try it as a tea latte with a dash of cinnamon.
Ingredients:
Black tea, Pecans, Cane sugar, Cinnamon, Butternut squash, Sweet potato, Marshmallows (sugar, corn syrup, modified corn starch, gelatin, sodium hexametaphosphate, artificial flavour, natural flavour, blue 1), Ginger, Nutmeg, Allspice, Natural flavouring.

view more
view less
Name: Sweet Potato Pie

Flavor:
How it tastes
Deliciously rich, spicy and sweet with a hint of creaminess
Description:
For those chilly days, get your cozy on with this rich and spicy vanilla chai tea. The combo of organic black tea and digestion-loving spices like ginger, cinnamon and licorice root is like pure comfort in a cup. But if you ask us, it’s the sweet creamy swirl of vanilla that makes this latte-worthy blend a real winner. Try it with milk and sugar for a belly-warming treat that’ll have you wishing for snow.What makes it great

 We added a vanilla spin to this classic chai for a touch of creamy sweetness.
 Feeling the chill? This spicy tea will warm you up in no time.
Ingredients: Organic cinnamon, Organic black tea, Organic licorice root, Organic ginger, Organic vanilla, Natural (vanilla, cream) flavouring.
Name: Vanilla Chai Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
Indulge in a cup of nutty walnuts and rich chocolate, better than grandma’s secret recipe.
Description:
Dense, rich, nutty and tasting like the most decadent of desserts, Walnut Fudge Brownie will rival even your favourite sweet treat. Made with sustainable coffee leaf, which provides income for coffee workers year-round, this rich black tea has dimensions beyond sweet. The walnuts make it even more addictive and delicious. Make it extra indulgent with a little milk, or better yet, use it as the base for a frothy latte. Like the best brownies — we defy you to have just one.
What makes it great

Coffee leaf provides steady income for coffee workers who normally only have income for 3 months of the year.
 Brewed to have a rich dessert flavour without sitting heavy after a big meal.
The black tea provides an energizing base to a knock-out flavour.

Pro tip : try it as a tea latte to bring out the chocolate flavour!
Ingredients:
Black tea, Chicory root, Monk fruit, Walnut, Coffee leaf, Chocolate (Cane sugar, cocoa liquor, cocoa butter), Cocoa powder, Natural (dark chocolate, whipped cream) flavouring, Organic sweet flavouring.

view more
view less
Name: Walnut Fudge Brownie

Flavor:
How it tastes
A vanilla bourbon spike to this creamy caramel blend.
Description:
Pour some sugar in your cup, can’t get enough! Brown sugar and caramel keeps this blend sweet & creamy while a vanilla bourbon spike kicks things up a notch. Sip this malty black tea from a mason jar and appreciate just how good you have it. C’mon, fire me up!
What makes it great

A warming fireside cocktail, without the booze. Unless you add some, we don’t judge. Warm up from the inside out by drinking this blend as is, with some milk, or with a spike.
 The malty-ness of the black tea adds depth and warmth to this already cozy blend, hinting at the taste and feel of a glass of bourbon.
Makes a great latte! Caramelized brown sugar adds a sense of decadence to any cup, especially when frothed with milk or your fave alternative.
Ingredients:
Black tea, Brown sugar, Apple, Roasted chicory root, Brittle pieces (sugar, hazelnut), Artificial (vanilla, caramel) flavouring, Pu'erh tea, Caramel pieces (sugar, cocoa butter, caramel powder (whole milk powder, whey powder, sugar, butter, natural flavour), whole milk powder, sunflower lecithin, paprika extract), Cornflower blossoms, Vanilla, Stevia extract.

view more
view less
Name: Brown Sugar Bourbon

Flavor:
How it tastes
Smooth, full-bodied black tea flavour with sweet honey notes
Description:
Good things are brewing in the Highlands of Nepal. Like this handmade black tea, a DAVIDsTEA exclusive from a family-owned tea garden named Jun Chiyabari. From the first sip you’ll notice the tea's rich, sweet, honey-like flavour. Even better? This little tea garden has set up a ton of community programs to benefit local schools, underprivileged families and the elderly. Now that’s good.
What makes it great

From the first sip you’ll notice its rich, sweet, honey-like flavour.
This tea comes from a small family estate in Nepal that uses its earnings for community programs to benefit schools, underprivileged families and the elderly.
This caffeinated black tea is a great way to energize.
Ingredients: Organic black tea from Nepal.
Name: Nepal Black Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
 Citrusy & malty bergamot with a touch of vanilla that makes it creamy.
Description:
This holiday season, we could all use a little something to look forward to. Get ready for a year-end glow-up in the form of tea: Winter Earl Grey. We’ve taken our classic citrusy & malty bergamot black tea and decked it out in red peppercorns & silver white tea. The result is creamy & fruity flavour with a sophisticated twist. Happy sipping.
What makes it great

 An elevated version of classic Earl Grey with Bai Hao Yin Zhen white tea.
 Last year’s holiday version of Forever Nuts was such a hit, we decided to try something similar with Earl Grey.
Ingredients: Black tea, Pink pepper, White tea, Natural (cream, vanilla) flavouring, Cornflower petals, Bergamot oil, Natural orange flavouring.
Name: Winter Earl Grey

Flavor:
How it tastes
Medium-bodied black tea with floral and citrus bergamot notes – rich, yet refreshing
Description:
Everyone has tried Earl Grey tea. And yet this one is different. It’s made with an exceptional mix of rare, ethically-grown, high-altitude black teas. Pure oil of bergamot, a citrus fruit, gives it an aroma that’s headier than usual. Discover the difference. You’ll never go back.
What makes it great

Looking for a true classic? Nothing beats Earl Grey.
This bold energizing black tea is the perfect choice for an afternoon cuppa.
Equally delicious with milk and sugar, or a slice of lemon.
Ingredients: Organic black tea*, Organic and natural bergamot flavouring, Cornflowers, Natural tangerine flavouring.
Name: Earl Grey Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
Warming spices on a creamy vanilla base with a touch of pumpkin & bergamot.
Description:
The minute sweater weather hits, we know it’s time to turn our attention to all things pumpkin. Get ready for the classiest cup of pumpkin to every grace your mug: Pumpkin Chai meets Cream of Earl Grey. A remarkably warming & creamy vanilla base with a pinch of pumpkin spices & bergamot for that London Fog richness. It’s our new fall fave, and we think you’ll love it too.
What makes it great

Features all the classic pumpkin spices like cinnamon, cloves & cardamom.
When Pumpkin Chai & Cream of Earl Grey come together, the result is drool-worthy fall goodness.
Pumpkin (the end).

Tea Guide Tip: Try it as a latte
Ingredients: Black tea, Pumpkin, Carrot, Cinnamon, Cardamom pod, Clove, Natural (pumpkin pie, vanilla, cream, butter, cinnamon) flavouring, Marigold Petal, Bergamot oil.
Name: Pumpkin Earl Grey

Flavor:
How it tastes: 
Comforting vanilla on a black tea base.
Description:
The best gift under the tree is just waiting to be unwrapped. This full-bodied black tea is enveloped with rich notes of vanilla reminiscent of cooked custard. Wake up to this comforting blend filled with the excitement of what’s to come. Sounds like Christmas morning to us.
What makes it great:

This blend is made with real, hand pollinated vanilla for a stronger, natural flavour. 
Rich & full-bodied, our black tea base highlights the creamy vanilla notes that linger on the tongue.
Drink it on its own or add a splash of milk for an even cozier drink best enjoyed on any chilly morning.
Ingredients: Black tea, Natural vanilla flavouring, White cornflower blossoms, Vanilla.
Name: Christmas Morning Tea Blend

Flavor:
How it tastes
Mellow flavour combo of sweet grass and lightly roasted chestnuts
Description:
An organic green tea unlike any other, Gyokuro Yamashiro (“Jade Dew”) is shaded for 6-7 weeks prior to plucking, so it’s dark, extra-energizing and extremely rare outside of Japan. We love its tea oil and chlorophyll notes. And its lengthy time out of the sun gives it an intensely rich flavour – think dark, leafy greens mingled with buttery sweetness. So. Good.
What makes it great

A very rare and sought-after tea – only very small quantities are imported from Japan.
Shaded during the final growing period, which increases chlorophyll in the leaves and gives this energizing tea a sweeter, grassier taste and a deeper green liquor.
Ingredients: Organic steamed green tea from Kagoshima, Japan.
Name: Gyokuro Yamashiro Organic

link: Southern Peach Cold Brew Soda Can
Flavor: How it tastesSweet, cripsy & oh so peachy
Description:
Craving some southern hospitality? Brew this peachy green tea in cold water for maximum flavour with no bitterness. It’s sweet, crisp and bursting with juicy summer peaches. Best of all, you don’t need to use a kettle to enjoy its fresh fruity flavours to the fullest. Total gamechanger. With this quick cold brew tea by your side, that sunny veranda is just a sip away.



This loose leaf tea comes packed in a resealable tin, so it stays fresher longer.
What makes it great

Comes in a resealable soda can.
Steep directly in cold water for a quicker iced tea.
Ingredients: Green tea, Papaya (papaya, sugar), Apple, Artificial peach flavouring, Peach, Stevia extract.
Steeping: Steep for 1.5 hours at room temperature or 2 hours in fridge
Name: Southern Peach Cold Brew Soda Can

Flavor:
How it tastes
Sweet apples with a hint of cinnamon & refreshing green tea
Description:
This tea will bring you right back to your childhood. Thanks to the spicy aroma of cinnamon, the sweet smell of apples baking in the oven and the fresh green tea blend. Don’t remember that last part? Okay, so we added the green tea. It’s a great way to bring all the nostalgic flavour of mom’s dessert right to your mug. So wherever you go, you’ve got the warm memories…but not the sugar. Mom would approve.
What makes it great

 It's like sipping a cup of fall comfort.
 According to aromatherapy principles, cinnamon enhances your ability to concentrate.
 The perfect dose of nostalgia.
Ingredients: Green tea, Apple, Cinnamon, Artificial (apple, cinnamon) flavouring.
Name: Mom's Apple Pie

Flavor:
How it tastes:
Smooth citrus, festive cranberry and creamy coconut tastes like a fruitcake you’ll actually like!
Description:
Ever wonder what the elves are sipping while they wrap your gifts? Elf Help, of course! This green tea blend is made with zesty and fresh orange peel, festive cranberry and creamy coconut. Inspired by the nostalgic flavours of traditional fruitcake, this holiday tea will have you grinning all season long saying: “I just like to smile, smiling is my favourite!”
What makes it great:

This blend tastes like a traditional fruitcake dessert – minus the stuffy candied fruit.
Its caffeinated green tea base makes it the perfect wrap-a-thon sipping companion.
Buddy the Elf-approved.
Ingredients:
Green tea, Black currants, Orange peel, Papaya (papaya, cane sugar, citric acid, sulfur dioxide), Apple, Cranberries, Coconut, Natural (orange, cranberry, cream, macadamia) flavouring.

view more
view less
Name: Elf Help Tea

Flavor:
How it tastes: 
Enjoy nostalgic eggnog flavours of velvety vanilla and warm spices, tied together with a matcha taste.
Description:
Sit back and breathe in the nostalgic comforts of a rich and velvety glass of eggnog. This matcha naturally boosts your energy, making it perfect for a winter’s day pick-me-up. Swirling with warm vanilla and spiced cinnamon notes, this new holiday classic is simply too good to egg-nore.
What makes it great:

Matcha’s natural energy-boosting properties give you a midday pick-me-up while keeping your mind clear and focused.
Our take on this traditional holiday drink features a nice touch of warm cinnamon.
Froth or steam milk to make an Eggnog Matcha Latte! Perfect for curling up by the fire and watching the snow fall.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Dry whole milk powder, Matcha green tea, Natural (eggnog, cinnamon roll) flavouring.
Name: Eggnog Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Like a blend of caramel corn and apple – sweet, fruity and buttery
Description:
This popcorn tea is better than the real thing. First of all, it has real popcorn. Second of all, it’s sweetened with apple. Third of all, it has green tea, which studies (well, ok, experience) say is the ideal brew for keeping you quietly alert throughout a late-night flick. Great for thrillers, dramas, westerns or comedies. Drink it at home or smuggle it into the theatre.
What makes it great

It’s got all the deliciousness of your favourite movie-going snack, plus an energizing dose of feel-good green tea.
This is our only blend with real pieces of popcorn in it.
It’s been served at countless movie screenings and premieres – including the Toronto International Film Festival!
Ingredients: Apple, Green tea, Popped corn, Artificial (sweet maple, popcorn) flavouring.
Name: Movie Night

Flavor:
How it tastes
Like creamy white chocolate mixed with a fresh pop of matcha and a nutty hint of raw almond
Description:
We sneakily boosted this creamy blend of green tea, white chocolate and almonds with a double scoop of matcha powder for added energy and benefits. It’s deliciously sweet and nutty, without being over-the-top decadent – perfect for satisfying your dessert cravings. And with its refreshing matcha green tea flavour, you can have your ice cream and sip it too.
What makes it great

It’s a healthy and delicious way to satisfy your dessert cravings.
We boosted this green tea blend with matcha powder for added energy and benefits.
Ingredients:
Green tea, Almonds, Black currants, Sugar pearls, Matcha green tea, White chocolate curls (sugar, cocoa butter, milk powder, whey powder, lactose, soy lecithin,  natural vanilla), Stevia extract, Natural (white chocolate mousse, cream, almond) flavouring.

view more
view less
Name: Matcha Ice Cream

Flavor:
How it tastes
Very fruity with slight sharpness from the passion fruit
Description:
Calling all passion fruit lovers! This fresh tropical green tea will become your new obsession. With sweet pineapple, pretty flower petals and a big hit of tangy passion fruit essence, this juicy and energizing blend is a delicious way to get your fix. Try it as a refreshingly fruity iced tea or infused into your next martini.
What makes it great

Passion fruits are super refreshing.
Makes an amazing caffeinated iced tea thanks to its energizing green tea base.
Ultra thirstquenching after a hard workout.
Ingredients:
Pineapple (pineapple, sugar), Green tea, Currants, Natural pineapple flavouring, Cornflower petals, Marigold petals, Natural (passion fruit, mango) flavouring with stevia extract.

view less
Name: Green Passionfruit

Flavor: Green tea with fresh lemon & a peppermint finish.
Description:
A bright & refreshing green tea of fresh lemon with a hint of peppermint – a curated blend with strong Sicilian lemon flavour.
What makes it great

 Tastes even better over ice
 Refreshing and bright lemon iced tea to beat the midday slump
 We love the brightness that comes from the natural lemon oil in the blend that evokes the flavour of Sicilian lemon.
Ingredients: Pineapple (pineapple, sugar, citric acid), Lemon, Green tea, Peppermint, Natural Mojito flavouring, Natural lemon oil, Sugar powder.
Name: Sicilian Lemon

Flavor:
How it tastes
Fresh, buttery and invigorating, with vegetal notes of artichoke, asparagus and a hint of roasted corn
Description:
Invigorating freshness you’ll want to embrace. Grown in the cool, misty foothills of China’s Nine Dragons mountain, this luxuriously rich organic green tea from Anji county steeps ethereal notes of artichokes and asparagus with hints of roasted corn. Plus it’s packed with all the energizing and detoxifying benefits green tea is known for. No wonder this this Chinese tea is a real hit among green tea lovers. 
What makes it great

Packed with all the energizing and detoxifying benefits green tea is known for.
This premium organic green tea can only be produced in Anji, a region in China’s Zhejiang Province famous for its bamboo forests and fresh mountain air.
Ingredients: Organic green tea from Anji area, Zhejiang province, China.
Name: Anji Green Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
Complex, sweet and minty – with a spicy finish from the ginger and cardamom
Description:
Explore Northern Africa, from its souks to its deserts, with our soothing and lightly spiced mint green tea. It combines fresh peppermint with comforting cardamom, ginger, licorice root and fennel – spices well-loved for their digestive properties. Deliciously aromatic with all the romance of the Maghreb, it’s the perfect way to unwind after a heavy meal.
What makes it great

Mint, ginger and fennel are all great digestive aids. With an added energy boost from green tea, this is the perfect blend after a heavy meal.
It's the ultimate comfort tea if you're feeling under the weather or having tummy troubles.
Ingredients: Organic green tea, Organic ginger, Organic peppermint, Organic cardamom, Organic licorice root, Organic fennel, Organic clove, Organic black pepper.
Name: North African Mint Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
Smooth with a clean bright citrus taste that’s perfectly balanced by deep blood orange notes, aromatic rosemary and a lingering floral finish
Description:
Flavours you’ll remember forever. From bright & clean citrus notes to distinctive blood orange, memory-friendly rosemary topped with a floral finish, this smooth L-theanine-rich green tea is all you need to feel instantly replenished and focused. Refreshing hot or iced, every sip is a memory in the making.
What makes it great

Made with GABA green tea, a next-level green tea known to boost mental focus and promote a greater sense of well-being and mindfulness.
Contains rosemary – and aromatic herb that’s been hailed for its memory-boosting benefits. Say hello to your new study buddy!
Made with invigorating, L-theanine-rich green tea, which has been said to help promote relaxation, as well as help improve focus.
Ingredients:
Apple (apple, citric acid), Green tea, Hibiscus blossoms, Natural blood orange flavouring, Orange peel, Rosemary, Roasted chicory root, GABA green tea, Olive leaves, Stevia extract.

view more
view less

Description:
We decided it was time to give our signature blend a nice new glow-up. By adding a pinch more ingredients famous for their cleansing benefits, we’ve transformed this cleansing tea into a full-on detox dream. David’s Detox is a lemony rooibos blend wrapped inside a green tea blend with a sprinkling of purifying dandelion root, super herb ginkgo, superfood spirulina and a pinch of ginger. Best of all, for a detox blend, it goes down real smooth.
What makes it great

Contains 15 ready-to-steep sachets – the easiest and quickest way to make a cup of tea when you’re in a hurry.
Made with the same premium tea and whole ingredients you know and love.
Perfect for on the go.
We increased the number of sachets per box and reduced the price and packaging, so you get more for less – plus a more sustainable steeping experience.
Ingredients: null
Name: Organic David's Detox Sachets

When cold season attacks, defend yourself with this revitalizing echinacea green tea. It’s fruity, energizing and overflowing with popular immune-boosting ingredients we love – from antioxidant-rich berries like goji and elderberries to natural cold-fighting staples like echinacea and ginseng. With this powerhouse green tea in your arsenal, cold season doesn’t stand a chance.

Description: Delicately floral, with a sweet seductive aroma, this jasmine green tea is perfection. Handpicked tea leaves from the Fujian region in China are layered with fresh jasmine petals for a sweet floral aroma, then shaped into pretty little butterflies that unfurl as they steep. It’s a rare reserve green tea that might be the finest jasmine we've ever tasted. Treat yourself.
Ingredients: Chinese green tea from Fujian Province, scented with jasmine flowers.
Name: Butterfly Jasmine

Flavor:
How it tastes
 Bright lemon layered over the flavour of the herbs, plus a hint of ginger.
Description:
We decided it was time to give our signature blend a nice new glow-up. By adding a pinch more ingredients famous for their cleansing benefits, we’ve transformed this cleansing tea into a full-on detox dream. David’s Detox is a lemony rooibos blend wrapped inside a green tea blend with a sprinkling of purifying dandelion root, super herb ginkgo, superfood spirulina and a pinch of ginger. Best of all, for a detox blend, it goes down real smooth.

 Crafted on a base of hydrating rooibos and green tea (the og detox tea).
 Dandelion root & burdock root are traditionally used in folk medicine for their cleansing & purifying benefits.
 Ginkgo has recently gained attention for its touted antioxidant & circulation benefits.

Flavor:
How it tastes
A bold green tea with strong floral notes
Description:
This premium spring-plucked green tea with jasmine is a real treasure. To create it, night-blooming jasmine is gathered in the morning and kept cool all day. In the evening, when the flowers burst open and release their scent, they’re placed with the tea leaves. This is repeated with fresh flowers over five nights, infusing the green tea with a most magical jasmine flavour.
What makes it great

A great choice if you prefer full-bodied green teas.
The tea is plucked in the spring, then stored until the jasmine flowers come into bloom in the summer.
Jasmine teas are scented by layering the tea leaves with freshly picked jasmine flowers.
Ingredients: Organic chinese green tea from Jiangxi and Fujian Provinces, scented with jasmine flowers.
Name: Silk Dragon Jasmine Organic

Calling all passion fruit lovers! This fresh tropical green tea will become your new obsession. With sweet pineapple, pretty flower petals and a big hit of tangy passion fruit essence, this juicy and energizing blend is a delicious way to get your fix. Try it as a refreshingly fruity iced tea or infused into your next martini.

How it tastes
Fresh vegetal flavour with a subtle hint of seaweed

Sencha green tea is Japan's most popular drink. It's not hard to see why – steamed sencha tastes rich, refreshing and crisp. What's not to love? Sip on this energizing and detoxifying organic green tea hot or iced, any time of the day. Whether you love it for its antioxidants or just plain love it, our organic Japanese Sencha has your back.
What makes it great

From Shizuoka Prefecture in Japan, known for its excellent senchas.
It's one of our fan favourite traditional teas!

Description:
From refreshingly juicy rhubarb to crisp & cooling spearmint notes – discover our standout & warm weather blend you’ll adore.
What makes it great

 Inspired by fizzy & fruity summer drinks
 Even better with soda water or sparkling wine
 Pairs well with fresh rhubarb recipes 
 Perfect for for a fresh afternoon pick-me-up

Featuring clean-sing dandelion root and organic sweet strawberries, staying hydrated never tasted so good.

Moringa is a super trendy feel-good ingre-dient that is popular for its health benefits.

This caffeine-free treat makes a delicious iced tea for kids.

How it tastes

Whether you’re looking for an afternoon pick-me-up or an on-the-go treat, nothing beats this sweet, rich and satisfying dessert-inspired tea. Our favourite part? Try it with frothed chocolate milk for a gamechanging tea latte. You heard it here first…

There are no peanuts in this super nutty blend.
Two words: iced latte. Trust us on this one.

This caffeine-free tea is the ideal post-dinner dessert. High in holiday cheer, low on late-night jitters.

Strong, alluring holiday aromas appear as this blend is steeping. Fill the room with warm scents for some extra cheer.

Inspired by classic apple cider, this fruity caffeine-free infusion is a delicious way to warm up on a chilly day.

How it tastes

How many berries can you name? Off the top of our heads – strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, elderberries, juniper, buckthorn, goji, aronia & black currant. How it tastes

How it tastes

With their soft green colour, naturally sweet taste and cool, juicy flesh, honeydew melons are basically made for spring. In fact, this delicately perfumed fruit has been a popular standby at spring picnics and dinner parties everywhere from the south of France to ancient Rome. So when we mixed luscious honeydew with tangy kiwi and a hint of papaya, we knew it was gonna be good. Light, fruity and totally satisfying, it’s a fresh new way to sweeten up your spring.
What makes it great

 Honeydew is the sweetest of the melons – bringing a lot of natural sweetness to this tea. 
 The kiwifruit’s name comes from its resemblance to the kiwi bird of New Zealand.

How it tastes

This tropical fruit infusion is seriously magical. Don’t believe us? Just ice yourself a cup. First it enchants you with its irresistible aromas of ripe mango and guava. How it tastes
Fruity, sweet and creamy, with the tea flavour of matcha in the background

We're taking antioxidant-rich matcha to new heights. An all-natural blend of matcha green tea powder, pure cane sugar and fruity notes of peach, this Peach Matcha will make you totally rethink your morning smoothie. Great for matcha beginners.
Made using only young green tea leaves from Aichi, Japan and natural flavouring.

Flavor: Creamy, bold & crisp with a lingering coconut flavour.

This all-natural blend of stone-ground matcha and pure coconut nectar is the easiest, most convenient way to make your favourite green tea drinks. It’s already sweetened, so all you need to do is decide what you want to make. You can blend it with milk and ice for an amazing smoothie, froth it with milk for a latte, or add a spoonful to your next milkshake for a real treat. Looks like you’ve got some seriously tasty experimenting to do.
What makes it great

 Made with our premium Matcha Matsu & natural flavouring.
 Matcha is loved for its sustained energy boost.
 A creamy mocha matcha sweetened with coconut nectar.
 Makes an awesome latte.
Ingredients: Coconut nectar, Matcha green tea, Natural mocha flavouring

Flavor:
How it tastes
Sweet, tropical and refreshing, with a touch of fruity mango
Description: Elevate your matcha ritual. Made with a base of finely ground energizing green tea powder, pure cane sugar and juicy mango, this natural-flavoured matcha is a refreshing way to treat yourself while sipping the whole leaf benefits of green tea. Froth with milk for a green tea latte, blend with yogurt and ice for a matcha mango lassi, or add to your next smoothie for the perfect post-workout snack.

Wild mint meets notes of freshly squeezed lime in this strong yet refreshing flavoured Mojito Matcha.

Perfect for matcha newbies.
This energizing green tea powder is a delicious way to fuel up.
The perfect summer treat for anyone with a sweet tooth.

Flavor:
How it tastes
 Rich & creamy with a hint of aromatic complexity from the bergamot.
Description:
Our classic Cream of Earl Grey black tea is one of our most popular teas. In fact, it ranks among our top ten of all time. So, for us, it just made sense to merge this creamy black tea beauty with a gorgeous green tea goddess: Matcha Matsu. The result? A rich, creamy flavour with touch of aromatic bergamot & vegetal matcha.
What makes it great

 Cream of Earl Grey is one of our DAVIDsTEA classic flavours, so we thought why not try it as a matcha. We can’t wait to hear what you think.
 Our flavoured matchas are made on a base of Matcha Matsu, so you’re getting all the benefits of the whole tea leaf.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural (cream, Earl Grey) flavouring.
Name: Cream of Earl Grey Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Reminiscent of a sweet chai latte with notes of cinnamon, nutmeg & cardamom on a Matcha Matsu base.

A delicious base of energizing matcha green tea, spiced to perfection with hints of cinnamon, nutmeg and cardamom, this cozy blend will keep you coming back for more. Sweet but not too sweet with the goodness of matcha, it’s a totally guilt-free treat. Whether you love it straight up or as a tea latte, its comforting spices will leave you feeling chai high.
What makes it great

 Take in the aromas of a classic chai latte with cinnamon, nutmeg & cardamon.
 Very fragrant with a lingering aftertaste.
 If you like chai and you like matcha, you'll absolutely love this blend.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural chai flavouring

How it tastes

If we had to choose a favourite childhood flavour, orange dreamsicle might be it. Now that we’re no longer kids riding bikes to the corner store (or so they tell us), we’re ready to give this orange treat the glow up it deserves. Give your matcha routine a frosty twist with this delectably sweet combination of bright citrus & creamy white chocolate. What (adulting) dreams are made of.
What makes it great

 Bright & citrusy matcha with a rich creamy note.
 Features young green tea leaves from Aichi, Japan and natural flavouring.
 Made with no artificial flavours.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural (white chocolate, orange) flavouring.

Unleash your flower power with this deliciously floral matcha green tea. Dripping with wildflower honey flavour and the freshness of energizing stone-ground green tea, this sweet and fragrant matcha powder is like sipping a spring day. Whether you try it hot, iced or as a tasty green tea latte, it’s pretty much guaranteed to put some pep in your step.

What makes it great

Perfect for matcha newbies!
Matcha is antioxidant-rich green tea powder that is packed with detoxifying and energizing health benefits.
Delicious hot, iced or as a floral green tea latte.

How it tastes

Sip yourself cozy with this delicious, all-natural blend of energizing matcha powder, cane sugar and a drizzle of natural maple flavouring. It’s already sweetened, so all you need to do is decide what you want to make. You can sip it solo, top it with hot frothed milk for a green tea latte, mix it into your cakes or cookies, or sprinkle it over your oatmeal for a seriously comforting treat. Great for matcha beginners.

Flavor:
How it tastes
Creamy vanilla, with a slight grassy matcha flavour in the background

This all-natural blend of vanilla, matcha green tea powder and sweet coconut nectar is the easiest way to get your matcha fix. All you have to do is decide whether you’d rather start your day with a Vanilla Matcha latte, a green smoothie or some next-level oatmeal. The good news? No need to decide between flavour, energy and antioxidants – this tea’s got ‘em all.
What makes it great

Great for matcha beginners!
Looking for a classic flavoured matcha? Nothing beats vanilla.
Ingredients: Coconut nectar, Matcha green tea, Natural vanilla flavouring.
Name: Vanilla Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Rich & sweet caramel flavour with bursts of saltiness, balanced by the vegetal quality of matcha.
Description:
Made from a rich mixture of sugar, salt and butter, salted caramel was first crafted by a French chocolatier more than three decades ago. And now, we’re bringing that same drool-worthy flavour to your matcha cup. Indulge in this silky smooth green tea powder laced with the flavours of rich golden caramel & a touch of sea salt for the ultimate sweet & salty treat. How sweet it is.
What makes it great

 All the goodness of matcha with a festive caramel twist
 Features young green tea leaves from Aichi, Japan and natural flavouring.
 Made with natural flavouring and real salt.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Salt, Natural sea salt caramel flavouring.
Name: Salted Caramel Matcha

Description:
Indulge in an exquisite stone-ground matcha that’s 100% Certified Organic – a rarity in the matcha world since Japan has few organic tea gardens. This premium green tea powder is made by removing every little vein from the highest quality tencha leaves from Nishio, a region with an 800-year reputation as the world’s finest matcha producer. With its fresh aroma, velvety-smooth mouthfeel and sweet, creamy notes of whipped butter, every sip is a luxury.


Available in prepack format only.
Ingredients: Organic matcha green tea from Nishio, Japan.
Name: Organic Ceremonial Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Sweet and rich ripe raspberry balanced by fresh vegetal green tea notes
Description: We're taking energizing matcha to new heights. Fuel your morning with this fruity and invigorating blend of Matcha Matsu powder, pure cane sugar and the natural flavour of ripe raspberry. Whether you sip it as an iced latte or in your post-workout smoothie, this finely ground flavoured matcha is an easy & delicious way to enjoy the feel-good benefits of green tea.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural raspberry flavouring.
Name: Raspberry Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Has the perfect balance of natural sweetness, creaminess and matcha astringency
Description:
Calling all matcha lovers! Taste our creamiest, sweetest, most delicate matcha yet. Made from painstakingly deveining and stone-grinding only the most tender green tea leaves from Nishio, Japan, it whisks into a smooth-drinking emerald-green tea fit for an emperor. Detoxifying matcha has never tasted so indulgent.


Available in prepack format only.
Ingredients: Matcha green tea from Nishio, Japan
Name: Ceremonial Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Sweet and fresh, with a ripe blueberry flavour and a light grassy note from the matcha
Description:
Kick your summer vibes up a notch with our sweet and revitalizing Blueberry Matcha. Bursting with freshly picked blueberries, mega-healthy matcha green tea and pure cane sugar, it’s an iced tea latte waiting to happen. The best part? This deliciously fruity blend is packed with all the energizing and metabolism-boosting benefits of matcha for an instant pick-me-up. Good vibes all around.
What makes it great

Makes the best iced matcha latte!
It’s a great way to power up in the morning – just add a spoonful to your smoothie bowl or oatmeal.
It’s got a base of matcha green tea – a powerhouse antioxidant known for its metabolism-boosting properties.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural blueberry flavouring.
Name: Blueberry Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Creamy and not overly sweet, with a strong cooling note from the peppermint
Description:
Festive peppermint treat. With its blend of energizing finely ground green tea and cane sugar, this flavoured matcha powder is refreshingly creamy and sweet, with a peppermint finish cooler than the North Pole. Sip it straight-up or as a holiday green tea latte topped with whipped cream and crushed candy cane pieces. 
What makes it great

 This flavoured matcha is made from young finely ground green tea leaves from Aichi, Japan.
 Need a pick-me-up? This sweet & decadent blend is packed with all the energizing benefits green tea is known for. 
 Try it as a green tea latte with whipped cream and crushed candy cane pieces for the ultimate holiday treat.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural candy cane flavouring, Milk powder.
Name: Candy Cane Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Lively vegetal flavour with a mild freshness
Description:
Looking for the best matcha powder in town? In Japanese, “matsu” literally means “pine tree.” But it’s also a term that indicates excellence. This detoxifying finely ground green tea lives up to its name. Bold in taste and aroma, this indulgent matcha powder is perfect as is, or as a base for your lattes, milkshakes and smoothies. Excellent.
What makes it great

Delicious sipped on its own or mixed into lattes and smoothies.
Matcha is a labour of love – it's made by removing the stems and spines of the tea leaves and then grinding the leaf into a fine powder.
Because you're ingesting the entire leaf, you get 100% of the benefits, plus an energy boost.
Ingredients: Matcha green tea from Nishio, Japan.
Name: Matcha Matsu

link: Matcha Single Serves Cozy Variety Pack
Description: Shake up hot or iced matcha refreshment on the go with 8 pre-measured portions of sweetened finely ground green teas. Cozy up with these comforting flavours: Cream of Earl Grey Matcha, Vanilla Matcha, Maple Matcha and Chai Matcha. Each little packet contains just the right amount of matcha for a 12 oz tea, so all you have to do is mix with hot water and add ice. No measuring required.
Ingredients: null
Name: Matcha Single Serves Cozy Variety Pack

Flavor:
How it tastes
 Notes of creamy vanilla and warm spices on a smooth matcha base.
Description:
Warm up a cozy afternoon by indulging in a velvety, sweet and creamy matcha with flavours of bourbon vanilla & warm spices, all on a smooth base of energizing matcha matsu. Sip as-is or make it a latte for those extra chilly evenings. This is your new go-to curl-up companion.
 What makes it great

 Matcha gives a natural energy boost with a cozy feel.
 Indulge and make it a latte to elevate any cozy afternoon.
 Our two favourites, matcha and chai, living in perfect harmony.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural (creamy vanilla, chai spice) flavouring.
Name: Vanilla Chai Matcha

Flavor: How it tastes  Naturally succulent blue raspberry flavours plays with zesty ginger and vegetal matcha flavours.
Description:
Mesmerize your senses with natural blue raspberry flavour. This hypnotizing matcha has notes of succulent dark berry & stomach-soothing zesty ginger. Naturally coloured by butterfly pea flower, this deep blue blend will enchant you with its look and taste.
What makes it great
 Zesty ginger is known to help soothe an upset stomach.
This blue matcha isn’t all looks – it’s flavour, too! Juicy and fresh, this tea tastes as magical as it looks.
Butterfly pea flower is used in Thai and Malaysian cuisines to naturally colour sticky rice desserts and puddings. It also changes colours with the addition of lemon!
Ingredients: Sugar, Butterfly pea flower, Ginger powder (ginger extract, glucose syrup), Matcha green tea, Natural (acai, blackberry) flavouring.
Name: Blue Magic Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Smooth and rich mouthfeel, with a perfect balance of creamy and grassy
Description:
Delicately smooth and velvety, with a bright green colour and refreshing taste, this is one of the highest grade (and most delicious) matchas on earth. To make it, every vein is lovingly removed from green tea leaves, which are then ground into a superfine matcha powder that whisks into an impossibly creamy brew. The ultimate energy boost, detoxifier and treat-yourself tea.
What makes it great

The fine grind makes this matcha green tea super creamy and smooth.
Matcha is a labour of love – it's made by removing the stems and spines of the tea leaves and then grinding the leaf into a fine powder.
Because you're ingesting the entire leaf, you get 100% of the benefits, plus an energy boost.
Ingredients: Matcha green tea from Nishio, Japan.
Name: Grand Cru Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Fruity, sweet and creamy, with the tea flavour of matcha in the background
Description:
This all-natural blend of matcha green tea powder, cane sugar and wild strawberry is a sweet way to power up. Packed with all the mega-healthy benefits of matcha, you’re gonna want to add a spoonful to all your fave drinks – from strawberry milkshakes and powerhouse smoothie bowls to energizing iced lattes. With a fruity matcha this good, going green has never been easier.
What makes it great

Perfect for matcha newbies.
This energizing green tea powder is a delicious way to fuel up.
Makes the best strawberry milkshake!
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural strawberry flavouring.
Name: Strawberry Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Refreshingly minty and creamy, with delicate grassy matcha undertones
Description:
Power through the day with this invigorating mix of matcha powder, refreshing mint and sweet coconut nectar. Fresh and creamy, it’s the freshest way to make your favourite green tea drinks. Blend it with milk and ice for an oh-so tasty matcha smoothie, froth it with milk for an exquisite latte, or sip it on its own. The options are endless – and delicious.
What makes it great

Great for matcha beginners!
Mint adds a whole new level of freshness.
Matcha green tea is naturally energizing, detoxifying and full of antioxidants.


This tea will be retiring once quantities have run out. But don’t worry! Here are a few similar-tasting blends we think you’ll love: Vanilla Matcha and North African Mint.
Ingredients: Coconut nectar, Matcha green tea, Natural mint flavouring.
Name: Mint Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Fruity, sweet and creamy, with the tea flavour of matcha in the background
Description:
We're taking antioxidant-rich matcha to new heights. An all-natural blend of matcha green tea powder, pure cane sugar and fruity notes of peach, this Peach Matcha will make you totally rethink your morning smoothie. Try it as an iced matcha latte for a perfect balance of creamy goodness, juicy peach and green tea benefits.
What makes it great

Great for matcha beginners.
Made using only young green tea leaves from Aichi, Japan and natural flavouring.
Add a spoonful to your next smoothie, latte or baked goods.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural peach flavouring.
Name: Peach Matcha

Flavor: Creamy, bold & crisp with a lingering coconut flavour.
Description:
This all-natural blend of stone-ground matcha and pure coconut nectar is the easiest, most convenient way to make your favourite green tea drinks. It’s already sweetened, so all you need to do is decide what you want to make. You can blend it with milk and ice for an amazing smoothie, froth it with milk for a latte, or add a spoonful to your next milkshake for a real treat. Looks like you’ve got some seriously tasty experimenting to do.
What makes it great

 Made with our premium Matcha Matsu & natural flavouring.
 Matcha is loved for its sustained energy boost.
 A creamy mocha matcha sweetened with coconut nectar.
 Makes an awesome latte.
Ingredients: Coconut nectar, Matcha green tea, Natural mocha flavouring
Name: Mocha Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Sweet, tropical and refreshing, with a touch of fruity mango
Description: Elevate your matcha ritual. Made with a base of finely ground energizing green tea powder, pure cane sugar and juicy mango, this natural-flavoured matcha is a refreshing way to treat yourself while sipping the whole leaf benefits of green tea. Froth with milk for a green tea latte, blend with yogurt and ice for a matcha mango lassi, or add to your next smoothie for the perfect post-workout snack.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural mango flavouring with annatto extract.
Name: Mango Matcha

Flavor: Minty, cooling & fresh, with the tea flavour of matcha in the background
Description:
Wild mint meets notes of freshly squeezed lime in this strong yet refreshing flavoured Mojito Matcha.
What makes it great

Perfect for matcha newbies.
This energizing green tea powder is a delicious way to fuel up.
The perfect summer treat for anyone with a sweet tooth.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural Mojito flavouring.
Name: Mojito Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
 Rich & creamy with a hint of aromatic complexity from the bergamot.
Description:
Our classic Cream of Earl Grey black tea is one of our most popular teas. In fact, it ranks among our top ten of all time. So, for us, it just made sense to merge this creamy black tea beauty with a gorgeous green tea goddess: Matcha Matsu. The result? A rich, creamy flavour with touch of aromatic bergamot & vegetal matcha.
What makes it great

 Cream of Earl Grey is one of our DAVIDsTEA classic flavours, so we thought why not try it as a matcha. We can’t wait to hear what you think.
 Our flavoured matchas are made on a base of Matcha Matsu, so you’re getting all the benefits of the whole tea leaf.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural (cream, Earl Grey) flavouring.
Name: Cream of Earl Grey Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Reminiscent of a sweet chai latte with notes of cinnamon, nutmeg & cardamom on a Matcha Matsu base.
Description:
A delicious base of energizing matcha green tea, spiced to perfection with hints of cinnamon, nutmeg and cardamom, this cozy blend will keep you coming back for more. Sweet but not too sweet with the goodness of matcha, it’s a totally guilt-free treat. Whether you love it straight up or as a tea latte, its comforting spices will leave you feeling chai high.
What makes it great

 Take in the aromas of a classic chai latte with cinnamon, nutmeg & cardamon.
 Very fragrant with a lingering aftertaste.
 If you like chai and you like matcha, you'll absolutely love this blend.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural chai flavouring
Name: Chai Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Sweet & bright citrus with notes of creamy white chocolate and vegetal matcha
Description:
If we had to choose a favourite childhood flavour, orange dreamsicle might be it. Now that we’re no longer kids riding bikes to the corner store (or so they tell us), we’re ready to give this orange treat the glow up it deserves. Give your matcha routine a frosty twist with this delectably sweet combination of bright citrus & creamy white chocolate. What (adulting) dreams are made of.
What makes it great

 Bright & citrusy matcha with a rich creamy note.
 Features young green tea leaves from Aichi, Japan and natural flavouring.
 Made with no artificial flavours.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural (white chocolate, orange) flavouring.
Name: Orange Dreamsicle Matcha

Description: Shake up hot or iced matcha refreshment on the go with 32 pre-measured portions of 8 sweetened finely ground green teas. Each little packet contains just the right amount of matcha for a 12 oz tea, so all you have to do is mix with hot water. No measuring required. Includes: Blueberry Matcha, Chai Matcha, Cream of Earl Grey Matcha, Maple Matcha, Mango Matcha, Peach Matcha, Strawberry Matcha and Vanilla Matcha.
Ingredients: null
Name: Matcha Single Serves Mixed Bag

Flavor:
How it tastes
Floral with sweet honey notes and a touch of astringency and freshness from the matcha
Description:
Unleash your flower power with this deliciously floral matcha green tea. Dripping with wildflower honey flavour and the freshness of energizing stone-ground green tea, this sweet and fragrant matcha powder is like sipping a spring day. Whether you try it hot, iced or as a tasty green tea latte, it’s pretty much guaranteed to put some pep in your step.

What makes it great

Perfect for matcha newbies!
Matcha is antioxidant-rich green tea powder that is packed with detoxifying and energizing health benefits.
Delicious hot, iced or as a floral green tea latte.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural wildflower honey flavouring.
Name: Wild Honey Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Creamy with a deep maple syrup flavour and a hint of green tea
Description:
Sip yourself cozy with this delicious, all-natural blend of energizing matcha powder, cane sugar and a drizzle of natural maple flavouring. It’s already sweetened, so all you need to do is decide what you want to make. You can sip it solo, top it with hot frothed milk for a green tea latte, mix it into your cakes or cookies, or sprinkle it over your oatmeal for a seriously comforting treat. Looks like you’ve got some tasty experimenting to do…
What makes it great

Great for matcha beginners.
Add a spoonful to your baked goods, oatmeal or latte for an added energy boost!
Made using only young green tea leaves from Aichi Japan and natural flavouring.
Ingredients: Cane sugar, Matcha green tea, Natural maple flavouring.
Name: Maple Matcha

Flavor:
How it tastes
Creamy vanilla, with a slight grassy matcha flavour in the background
Description:
This all-natural blend of vanilla, matcha green tea powder and sweet coconut nectar is the easiest way to get your matcha fix. All you have to do is decide whether you’d rather start your day with a Vanilla Matcha latte, a green smoothie or some next-level oatmeal. The good news? No need to decide between flavour, energy and antioxidants – this tea’s got ‘em all.
What makes it great

Great for matcha beginners!
Looking for a classic flavoured matcha? Nothing beats vanilla.

Flavor:
How it tastes
Sweet and creamy oat milk balanced with dark roasted coffee notes.
Description:
Trendy lattes aren’t just for the coffee shop—our Oat Milk Latte blend has all the sweet, creamy flavours of oat milk blended with rich, dark roasted coffee. Plus, this tea is made with coffee leaf—a sustainable ingredient that provides a natural boost of clean energy.
What makes it great

 Coffee leaves in this blend are harvested by coffee farmers in Central America, providing steady income flow for workers who usually have an income just three months per year.
 Roasted mate adds a rich, roasted note and a natural boost of energy.
 This blend is our first time using black tea extract.
Ingredients:
Apple, Roasted mate, Gluten-free oats, Fennel, Coconut rasps, Natural (coffee, cream) flavouring, Rooibos, Black tea, Coriander, Brittle pieces (sugar, hazelnuts), Carob, Coffee leaves, Roasted chicory root, Black tea extract, Stevia extract.

view more
view less
Name: Oat Milk Latte

Description:
This refreshing fruit and veg maté was born for Saturday night dance-offs. What makes it so good? It’s packed with invigorating ingredients that’ll get any party started – from sweet and succulent beetroot to nutrient-rich superfruits like goji and blackberries. Add in a pop of energizing guarana and green yerba mate and you’ll be moonwalking in seconds. Hot or iced, it’s pretty hard to beet.
What makes it great

Contains 15 ready-to-steep sachets – the easiest and quickest way to make a cup of tea when you’re in a hurry. Plus, our sachets are plant-based and biodegradable, for a more sustainable steeping experience.
Ingredients: null
Name: Just Beet It Sachets

Flavor:
How it tastes
Strong cooling sensation & deep spices with a touch of acidity from the apple cider.
Description:
Say good morning to your perfect just-rolled-out-of-bed detox blend. This mellow yet strong cooling cleansing blend is made with metabolism-boosting apple cider vinegar powder, digestion-friendly turmeric, plus a pinch of gut-loving ginger. To complete your am detox, we added miracle moringa tree – a body-loving superleaf. Today’s going to be a good day.
What makes it great

 A blend of traditional ingredients to cleanse the system – a great choice after a night of overindulging.
 An energizing base of yerba mate (energy without the jitters of high-caffeine).
 Ginger & turmeric are traditionally used to soothe digestion.
Ingredients:

This green-leaf oolong is lightly oxidized, so it’s more delicate, floral and fresh in flavour.

Description: This rare oolong tea from China’s Wuyi Mountains is velvety smooth and creamy, with a subtle hint of orchid. It’s said that it came about when the moon fell in love with a comet. The comet passed her by, as comets will do. The moon cried milky tears, which chilled the tea fields, withering the leaves and giving them a delicate creaminess. This milky oolong tea has been a rare luxury ever since.

How it tastes

The rising star of your tea cupboard. This luxurious oolong will have you falling hard for its natural fragrant lychee and plum notes. Add a hint of toasted caramel and a finishing roast that’s deep and satisfying and you have a premium tea that’ll keep you coming back for more. Long loved in China for its fruity flavours, this top-of-the-line oolong from Phoenix Mountain is the gem you’ve been waiting for. 
What makes it great

Dan Cong (literally “single stem”) oolongs like this one come from wild teas and are renowned for their ability to naturally imitate specific flavours like orchid, grapefruit, almond, etc.
The lingering taste of fragrant lychee will leave your feeling refreshing and tingly all over – a sensation commonly known as “oolong glow. 
 Got company? Impress them with the exquisite flavours of this premium oolong.
Ingredients: Oolong tea from Phoenix mountain in Guangdong Province, China.

We are big fans of coconuts around here – they might just be the coolest food on the planet. For one thing, they’ve been around since prehistoric times, making them one of the oldest plants you can find. Plus they have so many amazing applications, it’s no wonder people in Malaysia call the coconut palm “The Tree of a Thousand Uses.” But as far as we’re concerned, the number one reason to love them is this delicious coconut and oolong blend. Creamy, rich, sweet and fresh, it’s satisfying, comforting and completely addictive. Take it from us: you’ll go nuts for it.
What makes it great

 Pao Zhong (or parchment style) oolong teas are very lightly oxidized, for a fresh, green tea flavor.
 Coconuts have been around since prehistoric times - over 50 million years!

What makes it great

When you purchase any Bee the Change product, 10% of the overall proceeds will go towards The Bee Conservancy.
Made with traditional wellness ingredients like defence-boosting echinacea and throat-soothing clover.
It’s caffeine-free – meaning it won’t keep you up at night or give you the jitters commonly associated with caffeine.
 Shared by the NY POST as an impactful eco-friendly gift.
Ingredients:
Rosehips, Apple, Rooibos, Honeybush, Echinacea, Natural honey flavouring, Rose petals, Marigold flowers, Pink cornflower blossoms, Cornflower petals, Natural flavouring with stevia extract, Fenugreek seeds, Red clover flower.

view more
view less
Name: Bee the Change

Flavor:
How it tastes
Very potent and soothing
Sweet hot ginger taste, with extra spice from the peppercorns
Description:
This potent herbal infusion of anti-inflammatory ginger, green rooibos and peppercorns is so soothing, you might even say it has superpowers. It’s the spiciest, most comforting tisane imaginable – the perfect ginger tea to reach for when you’re fighting a cold or sore throat. The best part? It’s caffeine-free, so you can heal fast and still enjoy a good night's sleep.
What makes it great

Ginger is an ancient Chinese digestive remedy, so this is a great option after a heavy meal.
It's the ultimate throat soother – and it’s caffeine-free so you can drink it at night and still get your rest.
Ingredients: Organic ginger, Organic green rooibos*, Organic black pepper, Organic white pepper, Organic pink peppercorn, Natural flavouring with stevia extract.
Name: Super Ginger Organic

Flavor:
How it tastes
 Fruity and warming, with the bright tartness of cranberry.
Description:
Detoxifying, invigorating & everything in between. Cleanse & rehydrate your body with this tart & spicy caffeine-free cranberry tea featuring naturally sweet rooibos and dandelion root – a wonder herb said to help get over hangovers. With a fresh burst of juicy cranberries, this herbal staple is a multifunction plant-based powerhouse you’ll want to sip morning, noon & night.
What makes it great

 With detoxifying dandelion root & hydrating rooibos, this cranberry tea is the perfect way to cleanse & rehydrate your body – especially after a night of overindulging.
 Used as a medicinal herb for centuries, dandelion root has been known to help get over hangovers thanks to its purifying properties.
Ingredients: Hibiscus, Rosehips, Rooibos, Cranberries, Dandelion root, Cinnamon, Natural cranberry flavouring, Oat straw, Natural lemon flavouring.

How it tastes
A beautiful balance of chamomile & lavender with lemon for a touch of complexity.
Description:
Calling all chamomile fans. We blended this delicate caffeine-free rooibos with a handful of soothing chamomile buds to bring you a new bedtime favourite. To make it even dreamier, we added lavender accents that help relax the mind & lemon balm which is known to help induce sleep. We think you’ll also appreciate that we’ve added no flavouring to this blend. Just the perfect mix of sweet, sleepy ingredients.
What makes it great

 A dreamy blend of soothing chamomile & aromatic lavender.
 In aroma therapy Lemon balms citrusy scent used to help release tension.
 This organic blend features no added flavouring
Ingredients:
Organic rooibos, Organic fennel seeds, Organic rosehip peel, Organic chamomile blossoms, Organic lemon balm leaves, Organic lemon peel, Organic lavender blossoms, Organic rose petals.

view less
Name: Chamomile Dreamland Organic

Description:
A good night’s sleep is everything, now more than ever. For this tea, we sourced some of the world’s most calming ingredients: Vervain is a flowering herb used in folk medicine for its super relaxing effects while valerian root is popularly known as nature’s valium. We fused these sleep supporters with fresh lemongrass, lemon oil, & green rooibos – for a mellow yet intensely relaxing organic blend. Bonne nuit.
What makes it great

Contains 15 ready-to-steep sachets – the easiest and quickest way to make a cup of tea when you’re in a hurry. Plus, our sachets are plant-based and biodegradable, for a more sustainable steeping experience.

How it tastes

When the temperature drops, is there anything more satisfying than comfort food? Comfort TEA. Add a dose of sweet caramel to your evening with this nutty caffeine-free rooibos – think flavourful & delicate spices, cardamom, cinnamon & creamy butter. Inspired by our favourite caramel hard candy.
What makes it great

 A sweet upgrade on the chai flavours you love
 It’s caffeine-free, so you can treat yourself to a mugful before bed

How it tastes
A classic jasmine flavour with a pinch of citrus and floral orange blossom.

Florals for spring that are actually ground-breaking. The trend forecasts have arrived, and they're saying caffeine-free is in. So naturally, we’ve created an uplifting jasmine rooibos that's free of all caffeine. Breathe in hints of floral orange blossoms and invigorate your senses with a zesty hint of citrus. This blissful blend is perfect for an afternoon zen moment.
What makes it great

 A naturally caffeine-free option for a jasmine scented tea.
 Fresh spring flavors to invigorate your senses.
 Uplift your mood with an awakening aroma.
Ingredients: Apple, Green and red rooibos, Lemongrass, Natural jasmine flavouring, White hibiscus buds, Rose petals, Orange blossoms, Marigold blossoms, Cornflower blossoms.

Description: Sometimes when that midnight craving hits, nothing will do but a nice cup of Earl Grey. So when our customers asked us for a decaffeinated version, we happily obliged. We came up with a light and fruity blend of red rooibos with oil of bergamot and mandarin, great on its own or with a splash of milk and sugar. It’s naturally caffeine-free and packed with tons of amazing health perks. So now you can enjoy a tea party any time you want, night or day.

How it tastes

This blend is serving serious funfetti vibes. Enjoy unbridled fun and wonder in every bite of this light green rooibos that tastes like the best vanilla birthday cake ever. Better yet, this one has no artificial colours or flavours. You’re never too old to have your cake and sip it too.
What makes it great

Made with no artificial flavours or colours.
White chocolate chips and sprinkles add a party to every cup.
Green rooibos adds subtle sweetness and antioxidants.

How it tastes

This caffeine-free rooibos is ridiculously fun. Why? It tastes just like cotton candy! Developed with our favourite carnival treat in mind, this dessert tea combines nut brittle, candied mango and cotton candy sprinkles with a smooth, sweet base of green rooibos. The result? All the fun and flavour of fairy floss, minus the sugar high. It’s a carnival in a cup.

Our favourite way to drink it? Iced with two scoops of vanilla ice cream. Pure bliss.

How it tastes
The combo of cinnamon and rooibos is naturally very sweet and not too spicy

Organic rooibos tea and cinnamon are a powerhouse combination. According to aromatherapy principles, cinnamon enhances your ability to concentrate. Plus it has a clean and refreshing taste your breath will thank you for. And rooibos is super hydrating and bursting with vitamins and minerals. Your new favourite caffeine-free chai also contains sweet apple. Delicious.
What makes it great

Cinnamon is an even better breath-freshener than mint!
Cinnamon is great for concentration… making this an excellent caffeine-free option for a late night movie or cram sesh.
Craving a chai before bedtime? One sip is all it takes to satisfy your craving.
 Loved by REAL HOMES for the cozy factor: “No matter if I'm cold, tired, or just in need of some TLC, this cinnamon tea is a staple in my kitchen.”

The spiciness of the pepper & ginger sneak up on you as you come to the end of your cup – a warming hit of heat that’s not intense or overpowering but incredibly comforting. Drink it hot or iced.

Live every day like it’s your birthday. This tea is the taste-twin to yellow sheet cake with vanilla frosting, but better. Unwrap a rich Tahitian vanilla & rooibos blend sprinkled with sweet brittle pieces, sesame seeds, almonds and quinoa. We think everyone deserves a little cake in their mug.
What makes it great

 Real vanilla is hand-pollinated & the second most expensive spice in the world.
 Although vanilla is originally from Mexico, Tahitian vanilla is loved for its sweet and aroma.

Plus it’s caffeine, so you can sip it all day every day. With rich cocoa shells and the delicious flavour of whipped cream, this is one dessert tea that’ll have you coming back for seconds. 
What makes it great

 This caffeine-free rooibos chai is a delicious dessert alternative.

How it tastes
Sweet wild honey laced with the rich nuttiness of hazelnuts & almonds, and a light mineral note
Description:
An exquisitely smooth wild grown tea – discover a rare and refined South African rooibos with sweet wild honey & earthy notes, punctuated with a rich & nutty aroma of hazelnuts & almonds. Produced by a local farmer, this naturally hydrating and caffeine-free infusion is perfect hot or iced with lemon or milk, and made to be sipped at all hours of the day or night.
What makes it great

Made with a base of wild grown rooibos – a South African shrub touted for its hydrating properties.
Naturally sweet & caffeine-free.
This wild grown rooibos was produced by Izak, a local farmer, and processed by Johan – a South African tea producer who supports small scale farmers like Izak in the Cederberg mountains, often flying medicine to remote areas.
Ingredients: Wild grown rooibos from South Africa.
Name: Wild Grown Rooibos

Flavor:
How it tastes
Fragrant but mellow notes of turmeric, cardamom & ginger layer harmoniously over the sweet rooibos base.
Description:
Our fans have been asking for a turmeric chai tea, and we think we’ve nailed it. First, we started with a hydrating organic rooibos base and blended it with soothing organic ingredients like aromatic cardamom & warming ginger. It’s a unique caffeine-free tea that’s both fragrant & smooth – pure chai goodness.
What makes it great

 Sunset orange colour with aromas of sweet rooibos and hints of turmeric & ginger.
 Known as the “King of spice”, Turmeric is believed to be great for the skin & body. 
 Ginger has been used in traditional medicine for centuries to aid digestion & soothe colds. 
 Bright, aromatic & citrusy, Cardamom is traditionally used as a natural breath freshener & digestive aid.
Ingredients: Organic rooibos, Organic ginger, Organic Turmeric, Organic cinnamon, Organic cardamom, Organic cloves.
Name: Turmeric Chai Organic

How it tastes

Help calm a headache the natural way. This heavenly caffeine-free rooibos features soothing willow bark, comforting passionflower, cooling nana mint and relaxing lavender. The result? A smooth, fresh and creamy infusion designed to help melt away tension and ease the mind – morning, noon and night.
What makes it great

This calming, premium rooibos is like an all-natural headache soother.
Made with traditional ingredients like soothing willow bark and relaxing lavender to help melt away tension and ease the mind.
Trouble sleeping? This caffeine-free tea contains passionflower – a plant known for its sleep-friendly properties.
Ingredients: Rooibos, Nana mint, Lemongrass, Willow bark, Nettle leaves, Lavender, Passionflower, Vervain leaves, Rose petals, Mallow blossoms.

Flavor:
How it tastes
A sweet jasmine flavour that’s delicate, floral and crisp
Description:
Here’s a floral-scented pearl of wisdom: Hand-rolling tea is a tradition that began over 1300 years ago, when a Chinese emperor wanted to give an original gift of love. Our gift to you is this organic white tea, lightly scented with jasmine flowers and hand-rolled into delicate pearls that gently unfurl as they steep. Breathe deeply and let your mind – and pearls – expand.
What makes it great

This white tea is hand-rolled into little pearls. Infuse them in hot water and watch them gently unfurl in your cup.
Feeling stressed? The jasmine aroma is said to help soothe and relax the mind.
Ingredients: Organic rolled white tea from Fujian Province, scented with jasmine flowers.
Name: Zen Pearls Organic

It’s got a bright citrusy kick that’ll leave you feeling fresh, revitalized and ready to seize the day. Plus a subtle warmth and spiciness to get your senses tingling. Smooth, creamy & buttery with a delicate floral finish.
Description:
Ring-a-ling, hear them sing, it’s oolong time in the city. Enjoy this traditional blend dressed in creamy, buttery holiday style with a light floral finish. Dotted with rolled oolong pearls, this is the perfect holiday tea for all generations.
What makes it great:

Delicate and smooth, this oolong is a perfect traditional tea for holidays past, present and future.
This blend is inspired by the rural Chinese tradition of “monk’s blend,” where several teas are combined into one.
Smooth, creamy & buttery texture with floral aromas linger for a fresh feeling after every sip.

Let’s dabble in fall, shall we? Before you take the plunge into a full-blown PSL, dip your toes in this delicate and approachable pumpkin blend with only a touch of spice. On a white tea base, discover notes of cooked cream, white chocolate, coconut and pumpkin seeds seamlessly blended in this demure autumnal staple.
What makes it great

Want the pumpkin spice feeling without the in-your-face flavour? This is the blend for you. Light spice and soft pumpkin gives you fall vibes without overpowering your palate.
 Great alternative to Pumpkin Chai – a bit less intense, while serving all your fave fall time flavours.
Add a splash of milk and a sprinkle of cinnamon for a decadent treat, perfect in a tumbler for a walk through the pumpkin patch.

Description:
White tea at its finest, Bai Hao Yin Zhen is revered as one of the top teas in China. Our silver needle white tea uses only the first leaves and silvery, unopened buds of the tea plant, plucked by hand during the April harvest. You’ll love this tea’s pure, delicate taste and sweet complexity, not to mention the underlying grassy notes no tea lover can resist.
What makes it great

White tea is the least processed tea, meaning all the skin-loving antioxidants found in the leaf aren't broken down.
Comes from a small family-owned garden that has been making tea for over 5 generations.
To make this tea, the buds are plucked by hand in early April, when the mornings are still cold but it doesn’t rain every day.
Ingredients: High-grown white tea from the mountains of Fujian Province, China.
Name: Bai Hao Yin Zhen

Flavor:

Deliciously light and creamy, with the sweet juiciness of fresh peaches

It’s packed with mouthwatering peaches so it’s fruity, refreshing and just a little bit creamy. Plus it tastes amazing hot and iced. How peachy is that?
What makes it great

Craving a refreshing treat? This satisfying blend is like peaches and cream in a cup.
With its base of antioxidant-rich white tea, this complexion-loving blend is about to become your new beauty essential.

Description: Description: Our exceptional blue tea from China’s Wu-Yi mountains is known for its smoky & roasted taste. According to legend, a poor farmer had a dream that the iron Buddha ‘Kuan Yin’ spoke to him of a great treasure in a nearby cave. When he went there, he stumbled upon a single tea shoot which he harvested, planted and grew in his garden. To date, the tea honors the iron buddha with its smoky iron taste!  We recommend sipping hot and enjoying on its own.
Ingredients: Ingredients: 100% Ti Kian Yin Oolong

Description: Description: Our rare blue tea from China’s Wu-Yi mountains is renowned for its silky smooth and creamy taste. According to legend, the moon fell in love with a comet that passed her by. She cried milky tears which covered the fields with a delicate creaminess. The finest whole leaves were picked at these high-altitudes, gently rolled and semi-roasted yielding a natural buttery & milky aroma. We recommend sipping hot and enjoying on its own.
Ingredients: Ingredients: 100% natural Milk Oolong
Name: Milky Oolong

Traditionally, these ingredients have been appreciated after meals for their uplifting and palate cleaning properties. We recommend sipping hot or cold with a little bit of honey.

Description: Description: Our sencha tea is one of Japan’s finest green teas. The leaves boast a delicate aroma with a naturally sweet, smooth, and subtle taste. The umami-rich characteristic is a result of the region's unique processing method, where the leaves are steamed rather than fired.  We recommend sipping hot and enjoying it on its own.
Ingredients: Ingredients: 100% Imperial Sencha Green Tea
Name: Japanese Green Tea

We recommend winding down over a hot cup infused with honey to balance your Wood.

 The set includes x12 bio-silk pyramid tea bags of 5 of our wellness blends

 The bundle contains blends specified to balance each of the 5 elements to help you keep on track of your mental and physical health and wellbeing. In TCM, our well-being is based on the Five-Element theory. Each element corresponds to an organ which has an effect on one another. Wood to Liver. Fire to Heart. Earth to Spleen. Metal to Lungs. And Water to Kidney. The 5 element teas are blended to us to stay calm, stress-free, center balanced and feeling so so so good!  
 Each tea pyramid yields 2-3 aromatic cups.  For steeping instructions and ingredients please refer to the individual tea sachet.

Description: Description: Balance your Metal Element Take a deep breath & sip on NamasTea to awaken your senses & balance your Chii. The metal element is associated with the lungs, your breath & purity. We combined eucalyptus, nature’s ‘super-flower’ to unveil the passage to your lungs; so you can take every breath as if it was your first.   We recommend taking a few deep breaths and sipping a hot cup with honey to balance your Metal.

Our creamy, mango-ey & nostalgic blend will take you to a time when things were just simpler – and a little sweeter! Description: Description: A soft velvety treasure. Our Silver Rose tea combines one of the rarest silver needle white tea with aromatic rose buds. The tips of the tea leaves are plucked & processed by hand in the Fujian mountains of China only a few times a year. The sweet & floral undertones arise from the rose buds, which are carefully blended in with the tea for the perfect taste and perfume. We recommend sipping hot and enjoying on its own.
Ingredients: Ingredients: Silver needle white tea & Rose buds
Name: Silver Rose

Description: Description: Our exceptional blue tea from China’s Wu-Yi mountains is known for its smoky & roasted taste. According to legend, a poor farmer had a dream that the iron Buddha ‘Kuan Yin’ spoke to him of a great treasure in a nearby cave. When he went there, he stumbled upon a single tea shoot which he harvested, planted and grew in his garden. To date, the tea honors the iron buddha with its smoky iron taste!  We recommend sipping hot and enjoying on its own.
Ingredients: Ingredients: 100% Ti Kian Yin Oolong
Name: Smoky Oolong

Description: Description: Balance your Fire Element. Turmeric, spice & everything nice. The fire element is associated with cleansing your ‘home’. Our PuriTea is a ‘super tea’ that works to heat up your system, leaving you with a golden glow.   We recommend sipping it hot, allowing the Fire to ignite within.
Ingredients: Ingredients: Rooibos, Ginger, Turmeric, Cinnamon, Lemongrass, Liquorice, Basil & Natural Flavouring

It is a perfect pairing for afternoon tea, as the caffeine levels lift your energy without keeping you up all night. We recommended enjoying it with a little bit of milk, honey, scones & shortbread cookies.

Description: Description: Balance your Water Element  Relax, unwind & have the sweetest dreams with our sweet dreams tea. The water element is associated with calmness & tranquility. What makes our bedtime blend actually work? Valerian root! This super-herb tells our body’s natural alarm-clock that it’s time to sleep & replenish We recommend sipping a hot cup with honey before bed to balance your Water.

Description: Description: Brighten up your day with a golden glow. Made with love & wisdom, our Turmeric Latte combines turmeric with zesty ginger, a pinch of black pepper & is naturally sweetened with coconut. Coconut & black pepper are our little secret keys! They open the door to all the good stuff turmeric has to offer! They are known to increase the bioavailability of curcumin, giving us an anti-inflammatory up-grade. We love our Turmeric Latte with a cup of coconut milk, a dash of honey & a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Ingredients: Ingredients: Turmeric, Coconut Nectar, Ginger, Back peppercorns & Natural flavors.

According to legend, a poor farmer had a dream that the iron Buddha ‘Kuan Yin’ spoke to him of a great treasure in a nearby cave. When he went there, he stumbled upon a single tea shoot which he harvested, planted and grew in his garden. To date, the tea honors the iron buddha with its smoky iron taste!  We recommend sipping hot and enjoying on its own.
Ingredients: Ingredients: 100% Ti Kian Yin Oolong
Name: Smoky Oolong
